# File test/external/io_test.rb, line 318
  def test_sort_compare_same_content
    Tempfile.open("a") do |a|
      a.extend IO
      a << "abcd"
      
      Tempfile.open("b") do |b|
        b.extend IO
        b << "abcd"
        
        assert a.path != b.path
        assert_equal 0, (a <=> b)
      end
    end
  end
